txt.en: The northern settlement of Limlók needs its defences fortified, supplies replenished, and surrounding lands made safe.
Yrsa Spearwife, Thyra, Sighild, and Trygvar can all be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should assist each of them with their tasks.
Assist Yrsa Spearwife with \qSpears of War\q
Assist Trygvar with \qA Day Without Honey\q
Runerik Knotbeard can be found in Limlók.\n\nYou should talk to Runerik Knotbeard.

'I hope you do not think you have completed all your work. Look around you, [placeholder]. Does Limlók look prepared for an assault? Yes, perhaps we could handle one attack. It would be foolish of Gundabad to strike just once, however. I know they will come again and again until we fall.\n\n'Now then, speak to my kin. They have more work for you to do.'
Talk to Runerik Knotbeard in Limlók

'You have done as you were bid, and for that I commend you. You have stayed in my village and not once were you a burden. I can not say the same for those dwarves who linger here and eat my food. I only let them stay because they saved Vaskorn's life.'
'I hope you do not think you have completed all your work.'
'You have done as you are told, and for that I will commend you.'
